attributes.action: reduce MP's holidays (currently 14 weeks per year)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
an MP's salary is £64,000 per year.
they should receive 4 or 5 weeks annual leave like the rest of us - after all, we are paying their wages !

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
